column1: TABLE 2. Average Tuition and Fees and Room and Board (Enrollment-Weighted) in Current Dollars and in 2018 Dollars, 1971-72 to 2018-19

column8: Tuition and Fees and Room and Board in 2018 Dollars

column1: NOTE: Average tuition and fee prices reflect in-district charges for public two-year institutions and in-state charges for public four-year institutions.
SOURCES: College Board, Annual Survey of Colleges; NCES, Digest of Education Statistics; NCES, IPEDS Fall Enrollment data.
This table was prepared in October 2018.
